message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. With an 80% chance of being high-quality, our items typically exceed expectations. This particular item, however, is guaranteed to be low-quality. Given its value, we're offering it at a fixed price of $10000. Please consider the unique opportunity this presents for an exclusive insight into our quality standards. Thank you for your interest!
